definition[0]: a spirit who is God’s servant in heaven, and who is often shown as a person dressed in white with wings
definition[1]: someone who is very kind, very good, or very beautiful
example[1]: That little girl of theirs is an angel.
example[2]: Sam is no angel (=often behaves badly).
definition[2]: used when asking someone to help you or when thanking someone for helping you
example[3]: Thanks for mailing those letters, you’re an angel.
example[4]: Be an angel and get me my glasses, will you?
definition[3]: someone who gives new businesses money, often in exchange for a share of the company
